Welcome Class of 2020!

We're Vassar's Coders, Hackers, and Designers. We make things. VC++ was started to give Vassar's programmers the practical skills necessary to thrive in the tech industry, while also providing Vassar College with a team of capable thinkers and doers. We focus on mobile, web, and game development. Contact Us Learn More

About Our Team

We're Vassar's Coders, Hackers, and Designers. We make things. VC++ was started to give Vassar's programmers the practical skills necessary to thrive in the tech industry, while also providing Vassar College with a team of capable thinkers and doers. We focus on mobile, web, and game development.
